title: Strong Eye Appeal SGC 4 Red Cobb-$4,600; REA sold one for $6,000
author: griffon512

posts.post_title: Strong Eye Appeal SGC 4 Red Cobb-$4,600; REA sold one for $6,000
posts.post_content: Price is firm at $4,600 if PayPal Friends and Family or check.  Insurance/Shipping included.  Plenty of references.  Email me at [url]jdb435@nyu.edu[/url] for larger pics.  First to say "I'll take it" gets it.
REA link for one just sold: [url]https://bid.robertedwardauctions.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=63936[/url]
nice card for sure!  Great value!
I think it'd be in your best interest to post larger pics.
